duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item-specific training.
Applying science expertise throughout the item development and scoring process, including in meetings with clients and educators.
Clear communication to a variety of roles via chat, email, phone, and in-person/virtual interactions.
Mentoring and training the scoring team in the expectations of their roles and the performance of their duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, preferably within Life Science or Physical Sciences; additional Math college courses preferred.
